ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Directorate for Technological Industrial Development Zones

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Directorate for Technological Industrial Development Zones

CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.ADDRESS: Partizanski Odredi Boulevard No.2, PO Box 311

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Supply and Installation of LED Lighting for the Technological Industrial Development Zones (TIDZ)

LOCATION.P: Technological Industrial Development Zones in The Republic of Macedonia.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Tender bid bank warranty: Yes [3 %] of bid value.
Bank Warranty for high-quality enforcement of the Contract: Yes [5 %] of contract value.

LEGAL_FORM.P: Contracting Authority will not require from the group of economic operators to associate in a specific legal form for the purpose of executing the contract.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — statement of the economic operator that no effective verdict has been issued against the economic operator within the past 5 years for participation in a crime organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation stating that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent body,
— confirmation stating that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent body,
— certificate of paid taxes, benefits and other public duties issued by a competent body in the country where the economic operator is registered,

— confirmation from the Register of penalties for committed criminal offenses of legal entities proving that no secondary penalty — ban on participating in open call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and contracts on public-private partnership has been pronounced,

— confirmation from the Register of penalties for committed criminal offenses of legal entities proving that no secondary penalty — temporary or permanent ban on performing particular activity has been pronounced,

— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction — ban on the performance of the profession, activity or duty, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with an effective verdict,
Standards for management of the environment: ISO 14001.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — List of services provided by the bidder in the subject area of services with dates, location (to indicate minimum 1 (one) contract), to submit minimum 1 (one) contract and/or minimum 1 (one) Confirmation for provided services, issued by the recipients of the services, included in the attached list of services. If the economic operator cannot provide confirmations for reasons beyond its control, the ability shall be proven by submitting a statement on performed services:

— A Statement by the economic operator for availability of the technical personnel that is needed and that will be included in the realization of the contract for its entire duration. If the technical personnel does not belong to the economic operator, he/she should provide proof of its availability:
— A Statement on the technical equipment that the economic operator has at its disposal for carrying out the specific works:

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — The economic operator should have at least one (1) signed and realized contract for performed services of the same or similar type with the procurement concerned.
The economic operator shall have the following minimum technical staff:
Minimum 2 installers and two crane operators,
Minimum one electrical engineer with a B type license for working with electricity.
The economic operator shall have the following equipment available:

— The economic operator shall prove that he owns or through other means, such as a Rental Agreement, a Lease Agreement, a Procurement Contract, has provided the following minimum essential equipment in full working condition, and must prove that it will be available for the entire duration of the proposed contract — Minimum 2 crane vehicles with lifting heights of 8 m and 12 m.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Directorate for technological industrial development zones, Blvd. Partizanski Odredi no. 2 in Skopje
